title: Hotkeys reset
body: so with the lunar update all my hotkeys reset.  Is there a way to change it back without going thru settings and manual changing them back?

replies.body:
No updates should be resetting so it's really weird that a reset occurred.  Your config may have become corrupt, and may not sync up with the server anymore either.  You'll have to redo your bindings, but I suggest resetting your config to make sure it saves:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

I hope that helps!
